Package beans.link

Class SimpleLinkManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • beans.link.SimpleLinkManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    LinkManager, java.lang.Runnable
    public class SimpleLinkManager
extends java.lang.Object
implements LinkManager
    This class implements LinkManager interface. It provides management of pages crawling process. Manager stores URL addresses of downloaded pages and provides it for generating the statistic.

    Interface LinkManager extends Runnable interface. This allows to Manager to run crawling process in separated thread

    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Verbitsky Sergey

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      private Crawler crawler
      Stores link to the Crawler implementation instance
      private int depthLinkLimit
      Stores the depth value of visited pages.
      private java.util.concurrent.ExecutorService linkProcessorPool
      Store the link to the thread pool service that provide multithreading process of scan Used FixedThreadPool implementation
      private java.util.concurrent.BlockingQueue<Link> linkQueue
      Stores the queue of pages to scan Used thread safe type BlockingQueue
      private int pageLimit
      Stores the numbers of pages to scan
      private Link startLink  
      private java.util.concurrent.CopyOnWriteArraySet<Link> visitedLinkStorage
      Stores processed pages Used thread safe type CopyOnWriteArraySet The set interface stores unique values, which eliminates the possibility of reprocessing pages
      private java.util.concurrent.atomic.AtomicInteger visitedPageCount
      Stores the processed pages count Used thread safe type AtomicInteger
      private boolean workStatus
      Stores the status of work process: value True - crawling is processing

    • Field Detail

      • crawler

        private final Crawler crawler
        Stores link to the Crawler implementation instance

      • workStatus

        private boolean workStatus
        Stores the status of work process: value True - crawling is processing

      • pageLimit

        private int pageLimit
        Stores the numbers of pages to scan

      • depthLinkLimit

        private int depthLinkLimit
        Stores the depth value of visited pages. Link depth is the number of clicks required to reach a given page from the home page

      • visitedPageCount

        private java.util.concurrent.atomic.AtomicInteger visitedPageCount
        Stores the processed pages count Used thread safe type AtomicInteger

      • linkQueue

        private java.util.concurrent.BlockingQueue<Link> linkQueue
        Stores the queue of pages to scan Used thread safe type BlockingQueue

      • visitedLinkStorage

        private java.util.concurrent.CopyOnWriteArraySet<Link> visitedLinkStorage
        Stores processed pages Used thread safe type CopyOnWriteArraySet The set interface stores unique values, which eliminates the possibility of reprocessing pages

      • linkProcessorPool

        private java.util.concurrent.ExecutorService linkProcessorPool
        Store the link to the thread pool service that provide multithreading process of scan Used FixedThreadPool implementation

        private Link startLink
